title: Enhancing Creative Problem-Solving Competencies in Web-Based Constructivist Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Learners collaborate in web-based environments using personal devices, accumulating practical problem-solving experiences through language domain practice

learning_goals: Learners successfully complete language-related problem-solving projects at or above 80% using web-based tools.
Learners develop and present three or more creative language content solutions through group collaboration.
Learners autonomously write five or more reflective journals evaluating learning outcomes and detailing improvement plans.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
